short_summary: Parks Canada is seeking the services of a trained and certified EcoFinish installer or a Protech Polyarmor Series installer to prepare and apply the thermoplastic coating system known as EcoFinish or Protech Polyarmor Series to the deep pool basin at the Miette Hot Springs.

Eco-finish or Protech Polyarmor Series will take the place of annual pool painting. full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Miette Hot Pool Rehab - Jasper National Park

**Reference:** cb-873-40721095

**Solicitation:** 5P468-23-0224/A

**Publication Date:** December 15, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** January 11, 2024 (16:00:00)

**Description:** 

Parks Canada Agency (PCA) invites qualified bidders to submit a proposal for the Miette Hot Springs rehabilitation project. The selected contractor will be responsible for preparing and applying a thermoplastic coating system to the deep pool basin. 

**Contract Period:** 
The expected contract start date is December 15, 2023, and the expected contract end date is April 26, 2024.

**Services Provided:**
The contracted work will include the application of EcoFinish or Polyarmor Series coatings to the pool basin, which is approximately 10m by 15m with a depth range of 0.9 to 1.5m.

**Submission Requirements:**
Two-submission bids are required, following the procedures outlined in ththe Special Instructions to Bidders (SI04). Bids must be submitted via email to soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca or by fax at 1-855-983-1808.

**Attachment Requirements:**
Bid documents and attachments must be sent as email attachments. Please note that emails with links to bid documents will not be accepted.

**限制 enlargizations:** 
Emails must not exceed 15 megabytes in size. Large emails may be returned. If necessary, several emails with accompanying labels (e.g., 1 of 2, 2 of 2) can be submitted.

**Notice to Bidders:**
Bidder's participation is required for a site visit on December 20, 2023. Please confirm attendance and provide the name of the representative attending the site visit by December 19, 2023.

**Contact Information:**
Contact Kelly Nuevo at kelly.nuevo@pc.gc.ca for further information and clarify any questions or concerns.

**Important Details:** 
- Contracting Entity: Parks Canada 
- Contracting Entity Address: 145 McDermot Avenue, Winnipeg, Manitoba, R3B 0R9 
- Unspsc Category: 72153200 (Coating and caulking, and weather-proofing services)
- Expected Contract Value: $100,001 to $250,000 (Ex Taxes)

Please note that
